channel.title: Learning Rust on Field notes
channel.description: Recent content in Learning Rust on Field notes

item.title: Learning Rust 01 - implementing is_vowel
item.description: Recently I’m trying to learn rust by rewriting one of my typescript projects into rust. The project is silabacion. It divides Spanish words into syllables, and tries to provide as many phonetic features as possible. There isn’t much about it, just lots of string manipulation and pattern matching. It should be a good exercise to rewrite it with rust, and the result could be useful for those 5 people who process Spanish words with rust, so why not?
